title: The relationship between future time perspective and suicide ideation in college students: Multiple mediating effects of anxiety and depression
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Liang Wang, Xiaobing Xian, Jingjie Hu, Meiling Liu, Yulin Cao, Weizhi Dai, Qiwei Tang, Wenbei Han, Zhen Qin, Zhe Wang, Xinting Huang, Mengliang Ye
